articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Paula Abdul Sues ‘American Idol’ Producer Nigel Lythgoe Over Sexual Assault Claims - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The singer claims the 'So You Think You Can Dance' producer sexually assaulted her during two alleged incidents, one during the “initial seasons" of ‘American Idol’ and the other in 2014.
articles.content:
Paula Abdul has sued Nigel Lythgoe, former American Idol and So You Think You Can Dance producer, claiming he sexually assaulted her twice.
The singer filed a lawsuit on Friday against Lythgoe and t… [+2847 chars]
